claim_text: According to the International Monetary Fund's (IMF) projections from April 2024, Italy's nominal Gross Domestic Product (GDP) is estimated to be approximately $2.21 trillion for the year 2024.
The World Bank recorded Italy's nominal GDP for the full year of 2022 as $2.05 trillion.
Italy's economy consistently ranks among the top 10 largest in the world by nominal GDP.
